description: Monitor Windows Task Scheduler stores in %systemroot%\System32\Tasks for change entries related to scheduled tasks that do not correlate with known software, patch cycles, etc. Analytic 1 - Look for task file modifications with unusual parameters. sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security (EventCode=4663 OR file_path="C:\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks\\*") | stats count by user host file_path action | where action="Write" OR action="Create"
